faq.title: Open source license
faq.content: It’s an open source license that allows you to get a Page builder plugin and limited technical support absolutely for free. This type of license implies using Qoob for building non-commercial websites on any CMS and framework. Having bought open source license you are provided with free updates on the permanent basis. It doesn’t allow you to use Qoob plugin for commercial goals.

faq.title: Single Commercial License
faq.content: We offer you to purchase personal license along with Qoob plugin only for $29. You’ll be getting regular support all through the period of product usage. Personal license implies using a Page builder plugin for creating only one website based on any CMS and framework. With this kind of license you can’t use a Page builder plugin for commercial goals.

faq.title: Extended Commerce license
faq.content: By purchasing ONE 'Extended Commercial license', you are allowed to include qoob in ONE product (for example: premium theme, plugin or template) for sale. Customers and users of your product do not need to purchase their own license — as long as they are not developing their own commercial products with qoob
